definition: to lessen the authority, dignity, or reputation of
details:
verb
- to lessen the authority, dignity, or reputation of
= example: to lessen the authority, dignity, or reputation of
= synonyms: diminish
- to express a negative opinion of
= example: to express a negative opinion of
= synonyms: disparage, pick at
- to cause to seem less serious
= example: to cause to seem less serious
= synonyms: minimize, minimise, denigrate, derogate
